channel.title: Blogs on Pixelated Adventures
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Pixelated Adventures

item.title: 'Madrid Games Week' report
item.description: It’s finally over! We’ve spent the last days showcasing “Missing Translation” at “Madrid Games Week”, a huge event which takes place in that little town where we live

item.title: devGAMM report!
item.description: We just got back from Hamburg, devGAMM was awesome and we had lots of fun. This time we took an airplane instead of renting a van, so we didn’t have to drive for 24 hours straight, what a bust! 😛

item.title: Hey!
item.description:
Starting a new adventure!

We have tons of news for you, let’s start with the important stuff.
